document.full_text: more than half of baby boom-generation mothers support adult children financially and 60 percent are the go-to person when their grown kids encounter problems, according to a survey issued on thursday.
document.title: baby boomer moms keep supporting grown kids: survey
lines_and_colors: more than half of baby boom-generation mothers support adult children financially and 60 percent are the go-to person when their grown kids encounter problems, according to a survey issued on thursday.
